Supreme Seer Eli:
I cannot move you to the Altar of Tyrol! The demon Tyrol will try to subjugate anyone he can, controlling their actions. The number of participants in the Tyrol mirror ritual is determined by the number of Tyrol Revelations. Don't miss them - remember to look around! To avoid being caught off guard by Tyrol's warriors, remember: 1 Tyrol Revelation marks 10 people. Be vigilant!
